content: welcome to my newest creation the abilee shawl i have wriitten this pattern in uk terms with us terms written alongside in brackets there are also chart patterns at the end to help you along for this pattern you will need any 4 ply yarn or a scheepjes whirl which is what i used i used the the simply gorgeous salted caramel matcha and a 3 5mm crochet hook a sewing needle and scissors i would recommemd gently blocking your shawl once finished this will even out gauge amd also bring your design to life once blocked my shawl measured 71 inches by 31 inches this sale is for the pattern only this pattern is downloaded as a pdf you will recieve a digital download after the purchase of the pattern any problems please pop me a message at suzy@daisyboo net
